title: Agricultural Farmers Now Utilize New Features In ezCheckprinting Software To Handle Incoming Bills
content:
PRWeb 
Agricultural farming is a very big business in the United States.  Unfortunately, with the current economy, things are rough for farming communities. Halfpricesoft.com wants to help farmers save some cash.  With this in mind, the latest version of ezCheckprinting business check writer has been released  for a less expensive and more effective way to pay bills. 

"ezCheckprinting check writer works both as and in-house accounts payable and accounts receivable software for farming communities," said Dr Ge, the founder of halfpricesoft.com. 
   
With ezCheckPrinting, business owners can create and print professional checks with business logo from a laser printer easily.  The software can be easily adjusted to check on top, middle, bottom or three per page.  The latest version of ezCheckPrinting is also able to print checks formatted for QuickBooks for those customers who use QuickBooks financial software.
